events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience with software development and coding skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process and to answer any questions.
Your profile fits well with our requirements. The initial screening was completed successfully focusing on your technical background and project experience.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. This session will assess your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
You have successfully completed the technical interview showing strong skills in software development and system design.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and work expectations.
The HR interview was positive, and you expressed alignment with our values and interest in the role and team environment.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, reflecting your experience and expected contributions.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and clarified a few questions about the benefits and remote work options.
You have accepted our offer enthusiastically, and we look forward to having you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to our company! We have arranged orientation sessions and access to development tools.
The hiring process is now complete. We are delighted that you have joined us as a Software Engineer, and your first day is scheduled soon.
